then exponent for each term. Enter -1 -1 to terminate.

then exponent for each term. Enter -1 -1 to terminate.
3 4 1 3 -1 -1
A =5x^7 -4x^3 +10x -2
B =3x^4 +1x^3

A is not == B
A is not == B

Before: D =5x^7
